#### Test the number of operations

LINUX

nums=$(shuf -i 1-1000000 -n 500 | tr '\n' ' ') ; ./push_swap $nums | wc -l

ARG="4 67 3 87 23"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker $ARG
ARG="4 67 3 87 23"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker_linux $ARG
valgrind ./push_swap "2 1 0" | ./checker_linux "2 1 0"         
valgrind ./push_swap "1 5 2 4 3" | ./checker_linux "1 5 2 4 3"

MAC

nums=$(jot -r 500 1 1000000 | tr '\n' ' ') ; ./push_swap $nums | wc -l

ARG="4 67 3 87 23"; ./push_swap $ARG | wc -l
ARG="4 67 3 87 23"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker_Mac $ARG


ARG="-2147483649"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker $ARG
ARG="2147483648"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker $ARG


curl -O <link a fazer download>
chmod 0777 checker_linux

ARG="2 1 0"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker_Mac $ARG
ARG="3 2 1 0"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker_Mac $ARG
ARG="1 5 2 4 3"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker_Mac $ARG
ARG="-1 7 28 46 -33"; ./push_swap $ARG | ./checker_Mac $ARG

//--PARA 100 --
valgrind ./push_swap "98422 -50380 -80803 -30614 90497 -56724 18120 58082 -59262 -81906 -4308 -7872 -85742 -28879 -97334 -88049 -91207 -5842 -92847 15740 -47539 -19331 -6996 -38500 80718 -66703 44122 -70412 -88070 41498 -4230 -44031 -96975 35453 -59499 -93775 99947 -68095 -82193 -60483 90781 13671 10039 -63989 93018 15668 356 -24356 -63082 -4839 -6201 -56813 12332 -48765 -2070 -50519 57499 35918 16267 2057 72996 31289 90123 33526 81263 10962 -29383 4392 80944 -99411 84412 96554 -28342 -81031 72433 -61689 40666 -51897 43263 83055 -74161 73583 -12551 79791 -73458 -66400 94632 49652 -46037 -27253 85706 -13449 23730 24489 87243 -47202 29085 -29325 49108 -58355" | ./checker_linux "98422 -50380 -80803 -30614 90497 -56724 18120 58082 -59262 -81906 -4308 -7872 -85742 -28879 -97334 -88049 -91207 -5842 -92847 15740 -47539 -19331 -6996 -38500 80718 -66703 44122 -70412 -88070 41498 -4230 -44031 -96975 35453 -59499 -93775 99947 -68095 -82193 -60483 90781 13671 10039 -63989 93018 15668 356 -24356 -63082 -4839 -6201 -56813 12332 -48765 -2070 -50519 57499 35918 16267 2057 72996 31289 90123 33526 81263 10962 -29383 4392 80944 -99411 84412 96554 -28342 -81031 72433 -61689 40666 -51897 43263 83055 -74161 73583 -12551 79791 -73458 -66400 94632 49652 -46037 -27253 85706 -13449 23730 24489 87243 -47202 29085 -29325 49108 -58355"

//

leaks -atExit --list -- ./push_swap 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 21
export MallocStackLogging=1    --> para ligar a funcao
unset MallocStackLogging.      --> para desligar a funcaopb
